void EntityAsteroid::onImpactWith ( SteerableEntity *  impacted,
float  impactWeight 
) [virtual]

Explode if the energy is lower than 0. For blue asteroids, on exploding, the playership's energy is recoverd by a random value into the range [50, 100]
